授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to gain communication strategies and oral presentation skills
到達目標: The students will acquire discussion, debate, and critical thinking skills, and they will also learn how to make an effective presentation in English.
授業方法: This course will be online, using Zoom.

第2回: Review expressions, collocations, and complete page 13
第3回: Textbook: units 2 & 3: discuss requirements for presentations
Create a basic outline for the presentation, review Unit 2 reading, and complete the vocabulary exercises on page 19.
第4回: Textbook: unit 4: Education: discussion on educational systems
第5回: Group news assignment: how to read and summarize a newspaper article
Review the newspaper topic for next week’s debate
第6回: Complete page 37; work on presentation script, following rubric
第8回: Create script and PowerPoint slides for your presentation
第9回: Textbook: unit 8; work on sentence stress
Review the vocabulary and collocation sets
第10回: Textbook: unit 9; group work on presentations
Practice your presentation, following the rubric
第11回: Reflect on your presentation or classmate’s presentation and determine what improvements could be made by using the rubric
第12回: Review vocabulary, collocation sets, complete page 67
第13回: Review the sections in the textbook for the examination

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Students' grades will be based on tests, assignments, and oral presentations. No final exam will be given during exam period. Those students who miss five or more classes during the term will receive 0 points for this course.
